prompts: Create a cute grass-type Pokemon with large green leaves and a gentle expression.
I want to see a small, adorable Pokemon that resembles a baby dinosaur with soft colors.
Generate a nature-themed Pokemon that has a round body and a friendly vibe.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of spring with bright green foliage.
Imagine a tiny Pokemon that loves to play in the grass and has a cheerful demeanor.
Design a Pokemon inspired by a plant with a unique leaf on its head.
Show me a Pokemon that is known for its nurturing personality and floral features.
